ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 11am & 6.30pm, Sun at 10am (Sunday School & prayer meeting), 1st Tues in the month at 2.30pm (Tuesday Club, senior citizens and friends), Wed & Thurs at 9.45am (Noahs Ark, parent, carer & toddler, term-time only), Wed at 7.30pm (Bible study and prayer meeting), Fri at 6.15pm ('Explorers' for children aged 5-11 years, term-time only), Fri at 7.45pm ('Yawn' for young people aged 12-16 years, term-time only), Fri at 7.30pm (TNT for people in their 20's and 30's, term-time only), 1st Sat in the month 10.30am-12pm (Noahs Ark Dads Time, dad and toddler session)
